Label: ANAT_PLEURA
Definition: Pleural space or chest wall boundaries.

Label: LATERALITY
Notes: Attach to nearest anatomy/device/event when possible.

Label: DEV_VALVE
Notes: Capture brand and size/count when present.

Label: DEV_CATHETER
Notes: If size present, also label MEAS_SIZE.

Label: DEV_INSTRUMENT
Notes: Pair with PROC_ACTION + ANAT_* when possible.

Label: MEAS_SIZE
Notes: Normalize units to mm where feasible.

Label: MEAS_COUNT
Notes: Normalize to integer; store mapping if station-specific.

Label: PROC_METHOD
Notes: This is the 'how', not the action.

Label: PROC_ACTION
Notes: Use for event logs; link anatomy/device.

Label: OBS_LESION
Notes: Avoid mapping historical lesions as current.

Label: CTX_HISTORICAL
Examples: History of; prior; status post; previous

Label: OUTCOME_AIRWAY_LUMEN_PRE
Notes: Only when explicit pre-intervention measurement/grade stated.

Label: OUTCOME_AIRWAY_LUMEN_POST
Examples: improved to ~20% obstruction; widely patent; >90% patency
Notes: Only when explicit post-intervention measurement/grade stated.

Label: OUTCOME_SYMPTOMS
Examples: stridor improved; dyspnea improved; SpO? improved

Label: OUTCOME_PLEURAL
Examples: lung re-expanded; trapped lung; symptomatic relief

Label: OUTCOME_COMPLICATION
Examples: no complications; bleeding controlled; pneumothorax treated

Label: MEAS_PLEURAL_DRAIN
Notes: Use when size stated even if device separate.

Label: OBS_FINDING
Notes: Catch-all for findings that are not distinct lesions/masses.

Label: MEDICATION
Notes: Capture drug name. Dose usually captured in context or separate measure.

Label: SPECIMEN
Examples: cell block; core tissue; fluid; lavage fluid
Notes: Distinguish from the action (Biopsy) or the result (Malignant).

Label: MEAS_TIME
Notes: Use for ablation durations or breath holds, distinct from general timestamps.
